SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AnchorService
Service responsible for anchoring Merkle root hashes in the Waves blockchain.
AnchorService.AnchorServiceBuilder
Builder for constructing AnchorService instances.
Collector
Collects telemetry data from a remote server and converts it into ServerRecord objects.
Collector.CollectorBuilder
Builder for Collector instances.
ConsolePanel
Panel that redirects System.out and System.err output into a scrollable JTextArea inside the application UI.
DatabaseAPI
Provides an HTTP API for external components to query server telemetry data stored in the database.
DatabaseAPI.DatabaseAPIBuilder
Builder for constructing DatabaseAPI instances.
DatabaseHandler
 
DatabaseHandler.DatabaseHandlerBuilder
Builder for DatabaseHandler instances.
Main
Application entry point for the data collection and blockchain anchoring tool.
Processor
Coordinates the complete processing workflow: Fetches raw server telemetry data via Collector Hashes the collected data and builds Merkle-related structures via Hasher Persists both raw and hashed data via DatabaseHandler Anchors the calculated hash data in the blockchain using AnchorService
Processor.ProcessorBuilder
Builder for constructing Processor instances.
Scheduler
Schedules and periodically triggers execution of the Processor.
UserInterface
Graphical user interface for the configuration of the data collection and blockchain anchoring application.
UserInterface.UIConfig
Container for configuration values read from the UI.
